name: Koshi for Boobs 'em up
detailed_description:
Koshi is a new personage for the game Boobs 'em up. She has sexy magnificent body. Do you think she has more chances to make a good career as a prostitute? Do you want to try how good she would be on the street?

This DLC content is available from the game, on the room where you select personages.

Born in Palembang, Indonesia Koshi grew up in family of hard working people. Her mother was working as a room cleaner in hotel and her father was a farmer. Koshi hated this life, she loved PC, video games and dancing clubs. She wanted to be free and reach. On her birthday parents gifted her a PC and she spent all her free time in virtual world.

When Koshi was little, she would go on Nickelodeon all the time and they had this game similar to Club Penguin, except it was called Nicktropolis. And if you forgot your password, a security question you could choose was “What is your eye color?” and if you got it right it’d tell you your password. So Koshi would go to popular locations in Nicktropolis and write down random usernames who were also in those areas, and then she would log out and type in the username as if it were her own and see which of these usernames had a security question set to “What is your eye color?” (Which was most of them, since it was easy). She would then try either brown, blue, or green, and always get in, then Koshi would go to their house and send all of their furniture and decorations to her own accounts. And if she didn’t want it, she could sell it for money. Koshi was very smart and wanted to get everything she needs as easy as possible. This is why she decided to become a prostitute. She will get both money and pleasure.

Help Koshi to take her place on the street!

short_description: Koshi is a new personage for the game Boobs 'em up
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Bulgarian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Greek, Hungarian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese, Romanian, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Swedish, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 8 or later
  • Processor: 2 GHz processor or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX compatible video card with at least 512 VRAM
  • Storage: 1 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.5 or later
  • Processor: Intel 2 GHz processor or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible video card with at least 128 VRAM
  • Storage: 1 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04 LTS (or similar, Debian-based distro)
  • Processor: 2 GHz processor or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible video card
  • Storage: 1 MB available space
